entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle early this afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
